content.content: Focus On #7: RWA Lending Principles       For the 7th episode of Focus On, we will host Real-World Finance Core Unit member Eric Rapp @Eumenes for a deep dive into RWA Lending Principles. GovAlpha led a community-wide discussion on March 10th’s 181st G&R call which discussed the state of RWAs, borrower vs. lender perspectives, and professionalizing Maker’s approach to RWAs. As a follow-up, Eric will lead a deep dive into more of the nuanced lending principles in play for RWAs, including: •    Crypto Lending Comparison •    RWA Risk Assessment •    Investment Grade Standard •    Structuring an Investment Grade Senior Loan •    Arm’s Length Transaction Standard •    Case Study We will conclude with a Q&A to answer any follow up questions from the discussion.  Join us!  @juan & @retro will host.  When Time in your local-timezone format: 2022-03-22T16:00:00Z Mark it on your Google Calendar!  Where New Call Platform! Crowdcast call https://www.crowdcast.io/e/focus-on-7 Attn:  @SES-Core-Unit, @gov-comms-core-unit, @GovAlpha-Core-Unit, @Growth-Core-Unit, @daif-core-unit, @Protocol-Engineering, @happiness-core-unit, @Oracles-Core-Unit, @Risk-Core-Unit, @Real-World-Finance, @dux-core-unit, @starknet-core-unit, @data-insights-cu, @collateral-core-unit

Focus On Call - Episode #7  March 22nd, 2022  Agenda   00:00: Intro with Payton Rose  00:49: Discussion and Questions with Eric Rapp  1:02:35: Outro   Video https://youtu.be/0PHMxH9zsR4  Introduction  Payton Rose  Agenda and Preamble 00:00  Hello to everyone. Thank you for joining episode #7 of Focus On. My name is Retro. I am a contributor at the Sustainable Ecosystem Scaling CU. I am joined by Juan, our facilitator. Today we are hosting Eric Rapp from the RWA CU. He will be presenting the RWA lending principles that he and his team use to evaluate RWA deals. He will touch on the Monetalis risk profile using it as a case study to facilitate our conversation. For other episodes of FO, please check the forum.   Discussion  Eric Rapp 00:49  Outline1920×1083 223 KB   Strategy1920×1072 257 KB   Maker Crypto vs. RWA Lending Strategy1920×1115 232 KB   RWA Lending Additional Protections1920×1074 270 KB   RWA Risk Assessment1920×1078 227 KB   RWA Risk Assessment1920×1063 221 KB   RWA Risk Assessment1920×1066 231 KB   Structuring an Investment Grade Loan1920×1073 219 KB   Structuring an Investment Grade Loan1920×1076 179 KB   Structuring an Investment Grade Loan1920×1075 259 KB   Structuring an Investment Grade Loan1920×1068 214 KB   Structuring an Investment Grade Loan1920×1073 159 KB   Structuring an Investment Grade Loan1920×1064 267 KB   The Monetalis Proposal/The RWF Assessment1920×1068 269 KB   The Monetalis Proposal: Key Risks1920×1077 250 KB   Facility Risk Assessment1920×1064 258 KB   Facility Risk Assessment: Manager1920×1074 165 KB   Facility Risk Assessment: Manager1920×1066 175 KB   Facility Risk Assessment: Asset1920×1069 272 KB   Facility Risk Assessment: Structure1920×1069 275 KB   Facility Risk Assessment: Structure1920×1076 148 KB   Monetalis Proposal - Expected Return Analysis1920×1074 228 KB   Monetalis - Market Risk/Return Comparisons1920×1065 262 KB   Monetalis - Manager Risk Comparison1920×1064 165 KB   Monetalis - Asset Risk Comparison1920×1074 268 KB   Monetalis - Structural Risk Comparison1920×1077 266 KB   Arm's Length Transaction Standard1918×1071 265 KB   Arm's Length Transaction Standard1920×1069 251 KB   Monetalis Risk Assessment Summary1920×1073 243 KB   Conclusion: Key RWA Principles1920×1074 251 KB   Monetalis - Recommendation1920×1075 254 KB   Questions 55:54 - Juan: Regarding the Monetalis deal, would it be possible for the investor to form a fund to cover the junior tranche of this deal? 56:51 - Juan: Governance, or the community within the forums trying to push something as Monetalis, does that cut your ability to focus on other deals that you were working, and then you need to jump over this one, and other deals might get delayed? 57:57 - MakerMan: Is there a way of prioritizing these deals? How should we approach this? How should it be done? 58:24 - Asad Khan: How do Maker’s RWA borrowing rates compare to market rates? 59:58 - Frank Cruz: What are some of the steps taken in TradeFi to monitor loans? Who is on the ground visiting sites? 1:01:53 - Juan: What is the best way to contact you?  Closing Comment  Juan  Outro 1:02:35  Thanks to everyone for coming and participating. Thanks, Eric, for joining us. We will keep the discussion going at forum.makerdao.com.   Credits  Kunfu-po produced this summary.  @gala produced this summary. Everyone who spoke and presented on the call, listed in the headers.

Hey you guys have a recording of this RWF presentation? Seems like there’s like 150,000 community members that are confused about the RWA methodologies. Its must see TV for those 150K–vid does a nice job of explaining it.
I think the recording was just added to the initial post.
hey @flipflopflapdelegate the recording is now up and you can also check out the notes
Thanks Retro. RWA will attempt to answer any questions on this thread.

flipflopflapdelegate:  Hey you guys have a recording of this RWF presentation?   When @blimpa doesn’t provide an amazing graphic (ngmi), I usually modify the original post to keep the recording visible. Maybe I should leave some note stating that to make it clear?
